snippet: The case drew an unusual amount of attention in Indonesia, which relies on foreign investment to harness its resources, partly because government agencies clashed over the validity of the case.
abstract: Indonesian court convicts Kukuh Kertasafari, local employee of Chevron, of corruption in case that has escalated uncertainties for foreign investors in nation; country relies on foreign investment to harness its resources.
lead_paragraph: The case drew an unusual amount of attention in Indonesia, which relies on foreign investment to harness its resources, partly because government agencies clashed over the validity of the case.

headline.main: Conviction of Chevron Worker Spurs Oil Industry Concerns in Indonesia
headline.print_headline: Conviction of Chevron Worker Spurs Oil Industry Concerns in Indonesia
